alfredsnippet.snippet:
Journey to the Centre of Uncertainty, R A Lyttleton, Speculations in Science & Technology, Vol. 8, No. 5 p.343

"The Oort-shell, through the ceaseless repetitive workings of the Gold effect has become widely regarded as a firmly established triumph of 'modern cometary theory' when in fact, it is a piece of trash heralded as one of the corner-stones of cometary 'science'."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Oort-Shell
